bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: List of contributors to the Chemistry Building Fund, Washington and Jefferson College, 1940

div1.p: This is the document which served as the cornerstone of the practical joke played on Hench. Hench's alma mater is the crux of the prank.

div1.head: List of contributors to the Chemistry Building Fund, Washington and Jefferson College, 1940
div1.opener:
special
Washington
and
Jefferson
College
founded 1780
A Mile Post
div1.p:
CONTRIBUTORS TO THE CHEMISTRY BUILDING FUND
These are the names of all contributors to the Chemistry Building.
The list does not contain memorials which are on the bronze tablet.
These will be found elsewhere in the booklet.
